text: The Marriage of the Bear () is a 1925 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Vladimir Gardin and Konstantin Eggert.Непрокатное кино. Афиша 21-27 мартаМЕДВЕЖЬЯ СВАДЬБА It stars Konstantin Eggert, Vera Malinovskaya, and B. Afonin. ==Actors== * Konstantin Eggert * Vera Malinovskaya as Yulka * B. Afonin * Varvara Alyokhina as Old Adelina * Alexander Geirot * Aleksandra Kartseva as Adelina Shemet == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1925 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin
title: The Marriage of the Bear
